Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in _check: 7
sub _check {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->SUPER::_check;
  my $uop = $self->{def}{string} || $self->{uop};
  $self->Error("You can only use '%s' with (non-negative) numbers",$uop)
    unless $self->{op}->class =~ /Number|INTEGER|DIVIDE/;
}
